#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int b[26][1000001];
int main()
{
	int z,i,j,q;
	char x;
	string a;
	cin>>a;
	for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
	{
		z=a[i]-'a';
		for(j=0;j<26;j++)
		{
			if(j==z)
			b[j][i+1]=b[j][i]+1;
			else
			b[j][i+1]=b[j][i];
		}
	}
	cin>>q;
	while(q--)
	{
		cin>>x>>i>>j;
		cout<<b[x-'a'][j]-b[x-'a'][i-1]<<endl;
	}
}
